languages.text:
The Cyber-Eagle has +3 MP which affects its ability range.
This bonus is removed after the first combat encounter.

traits.locale_text:
The Cyber-Eagle has +3 MP which affects its ability range.
This bonus is removed after the first combat encounter.

languages.text: During the next combat, this cyber-eagle's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} will be increased by +3.
languages.original_text: В следующем бою {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} этого киберорла будут увеличены на 3.
